revision.text:
{{Infobox dungeon |name = Flower Paradise |image = [[File:Flower Paradise.png|300px]] |caption = A bird's-eye view of Flower Paradise. |tokens = 96,500 |location = North of Route 224. }} '''Flower Paradise''' is a [[dungeons|dungeon]] in [[Sinnoh]]. It initially has 64 tiles arranged in an 8x8 square, including 8 chest tiles, 19 non-boss encounter tiles, and 1 boss encounter tile. Wild Encounters have 2,603,000 HP.
== Encounter Tables ==
===Wild Encounters===
{| class="wikitable" |- ! Wild Pokémon !! colspan=2|Trainers |- ! Encounter !! Trainer !! Pokémon Team |- | [[File:Gloom.png|40px]] Gloom || colspan=2 rowspan=7| <center>N/A |- | [[File:Bellsprout.png|40px]] Bellsprout |- | [[File:Tangela.png|40px]] Tangela |- | [[File:Skiploom.png|40px]] Skiploom |- | [[File:Lombre.png|40px]] Lombre |- | [[File:Seedot.png|40px]] Seedot |- | [[File:Roselia.png|40px]] Roselia |}
===Boss Encounters===
{| class="wikitable" |- ! Wild Pokémon !! Base Health !! Boss Trainer !! Pokémon Team !! Base Health |- | [[File:Parasect.png|40px]] Parasect || <center>9,900,000 || rowspan=4 colspan=3 | <center> N/A |- | [[File:Breloom.png|40px]] Breloom || rowspan=3|<center>11,000,000 |- | [[File:Shaymin_(land).png|40px]] Shaymin (land) |- | [[File:Shaymin_(sky).png|40px]] '''Shaymin (sky)*''' |} '''*Note Shaymin (land) must be caught for Shaymin (sky) to appear.'''

<tab name="Debuff"> After reaching [[Alola]], the drop chance for items will be [[Dungeons#Dungeon Loot Regional Debuff|debuffed]].
